entry.title: The ODI’s international startup network comes to South-East Asia
When an international partnership works: growing open data startups in Mexico
entry.summary: Emma Truswell reports from Mexico City on how a partnership between the ODI, the Mexican government and an NGO has strengthened an international relationship, a government policy programme and a talented group of startups

entry.title: Creative bureaucrats around the world find an outlet in open data
entry.summary: ODI Services Business Manager Emma Truswell reflects on the first day of the ODI's second Open Data Leaders Network: where open data leaders from around the world gather for a week to share perspectives, challenges and best-practices.

entry.title: Putting open data into policy: lessons from leaders around the world
entry.summary: On the first day of the Open Data Institute’s [week of workshops](https://theodi.org/news/national-leaders-create-global-network-open-data-impact "week of workshops") with open data leaders from around the world, one participant said:
